product_name: SportHill Marathon Shorts - Black - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Popular among elite runners and weekend joggers alike, the women's SportHill Marathon Shorts in black feature a comfort rise, lightweight, breathable fabrics and an inner liner. Stretch polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries fast. Flat waistband has internal drawcord. Inside key/card envelope pocket. 2 easy-access side pockets and 1 center-back zippered pocket. The women's Marathon Shorts from SportHill have 360-degree reflectivity. Special buy.
